# image_tiling enumeration

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/image_tiling
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:08:20.427082

---

Tiling options values

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Enumerators

The `image_tiling` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `Stretch` | Stretch the image to fit the available space. |
| `Repeat` | Repeat/Wrap the image to fill the available space. |
